channel.title: Server setup help
channel.description:
I am new to this so i was just wondering....i got the client and base...did a little bit of editing...got my no-ip setup and ports forwarded...was using hamachi but it sucks...so now where do i go from here to get other to play on my server... flame if you want just atleast give answer first lol
if someoen wants to help through tv i would be able to do that as well
